dublin_core.dcvalue: In a context where sleep laboratories are overwhelmed by a growing demand to diagnose obstructive sleep apnea syndrome OSAS efficient substitutive solutions to in laboratory polysomnography should be found To compare the effectiveness and costs of home unattended polysomnography Hpsg and telemonitored polysomnography TMpsg a cost minimization study was performed
International journal of technology assessment in health care
A cost-minimization study of telemedicine. The case of telemonitored polysomnography to diagnose obstructive sleep apnea syndrome.
